original_text: When Leah saw that she had ceased bearing children, she took her servant Zilpah and gave her to Jacob as a wife.
korean_text: 레아가 자기의 출산이 멈춤을 보고 그의 시녀 실바를 데려다가 야곱에게 주어 아내로 삼게 하였더니

sentences.original_text: When Leah saw that she had ceased bearing children
sentences.korean_translation: 레아가 자신이 아이를 낳지 못하게 되었음을 보고

sentences.original_text: and gave her to Jacob as a wife
